questions.question: 1NF (First Normal Form) kya hai?
options: Jismean keval atomic values hoti hain
Jismean multiple values allow hoti hain
Jismean primary key ki zarurat nahi hoti
questions.explanation: 1NF ensure karta hai ki har column mein sirf atomic (indivisible) values hon. Koi repeating groups ya arrays allowed nahi hote.

questions.question: Kaunsa normal form partial dependency ko hatata hai?
questions.explanation: 2NF partial dependency ko hatata hai. Ek table 2NF mein tab hota hai jab wo 1NF mein ho aur sabhi non-key attributes puri tarah primary key par dependent hon.

questions.question: 3NF kya eliminate karta hai?
questions.explanation: 3NF transitive dependency ko eliminate karta hai. Koi bhi non-prime attribute kisi dusre non-prime attribute par depend nahi karna chahiye.

questions.question: BCNF kis normal form se zyada strict hai?
questions.explanation: BCNF (Boyce-Codd Normal Form) 3NF se zyada strict hai. Har functional dependency X→Y ke liye, X ko Ek super key hona chahiye.

questions.question: Functional dependency kya hai?
options: Do attributes ke beech ka constraint
questions.explanation: Functional dependency ek constraint hai jahan ek attribute dusre attribute ko uniquely determine karta hai. Ise X → Y likha jata hai.

questions.question: Kaunsi key row ko uniquely identify karti hai?
questions.explanation: Primary Key table mein har row ko uniquely identify karti hai. Ismein NULL values nahi ho sakti aur ye unique honi chahiye.

questions.question: Denormalization kya hai?
options: Performance ke liye redundancy add karna
questions.explanation: Denormalization read performance badhane ke liye redundancy add karne ka process hai, lekin isse write performance kam ho sakti hai.

questions.question: 4NF kis dependency se deal karta hai?
questions.explanation: 4NF multi-valued dependencies ko eliminate karta hai. Ye ensure karta hai ki kisi table mein do ya usse zyada independent multi-valued facts na hon.

questions.question: Candidate key kya hai?
questions.explanation: Candidate key ek minimal super key hai - ye rows ko uniquely identify karti hai bina kisi redundant attribute ke.

questions.question: Inmein se kaunsa database anomaly nahi hai?
questions.explanation: Selection anomaly jaisa kuch nahi hota. Teen main anomalies hain: Insertion, Deletion, aur Update anomalies.
